Package com.uzh.ase.dailygrind.postservice.post.mapper

Interface CommentMapper

public interface CommentMapper
Mapper interface for mapping between CommentDto and CommentEntity.

This interface uses MapStruct to automatically generate the implementation for converting between the data transfer object (DTO) and entity representations of a comment.

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    CommentDto
    toCommentDto(CommentEntity commentEntity)
    Maps a CommentEntity to a CommentDto.
    CommentEntity
